thread.title: Ground News - Raining on the light parade
thread.title_full: Ground News - Raining on the light parade

author: Brainerd Dispatch
title: Ground News - Raining on the light parade
text:
Summary by Brainerd Dispatch BRAINERD Christmas rain put a damper on the 2023 Sertoma Winter Wonderland at the Northland Arboretum. Closing for the fifth day of the season Wednesday, Dec. 27, Eric Larson, president of Brainerd Noon Sertoma Club and chair of Winter Wonderland, said the rain greatly affected the fundraising efforts of the group. About 300 cars a night are average on Christmas weekend and they have been closed since Dec. 24, Larson said. https://www.fac… Share menu More
